solution_line_template: There were {initial_used_gb} - {deleted_folder_gb} = <<{initial_used_gb}-{deleted_folder_gb}={used_after_delete_gb}>>{used_after_delete_gb} gigabytes used after deleting some files.
Then, the used space went up to {used_after_delete_gb} + {new_files_gb} = <<{used_after_delete_gb}+{new_files_gb}={final_used_gb}>>{final_used_gb} gigabytes after storing other files.

Thus, the new {new_drive_capacity_gb} gigabytes external drive will have {new_drive_capacity_gb} - {final_used_gb} = <<{new_drive_capacity_gb}-{final_used_gb}={free_space_new_drive_gb}>>{free_space_new_drive_gb} gigabytes free.
